task.title: Set up customized playback
task.shortdesc: You can customize or override default ad behaviors.

prereq.p: Before you can customize or override ad behaviors, register the ad policy instance with .

context.p: To customize ad behaviors, do one of the following:

ul.li:
Conform to the PTAdPolicySelector protocol and implement all the required policy selection methods.
This option is recommended if you need to override all the default ad behaviors.

Override the PTDefaultAdPolicySelector class and provide implementations for only those behaviors that require customization.
This option is recommended if you need to override only some of the default behaviors.

context.p: For both options, complete the following tasks:

step.cmd: Register the policy instance to be used by through the client factory.

info.note: Custom ad policies that are registered at the beginning of playback are cleared when the PTMediaPlayer instance is deallocated. Your application must register a policy selector instance each time a new playback session is created.
